column4: dayo; Oh about "Terminal notes" I meant I've been making notes on using the Terminal but have using Text Editor for this which is pretty boring - a bit frustrating at times too!
check out tomboy for notes (already installed) or load up Vym from the repos.. it's a mind mapping program.. makes it easier to catagorize things..
I really like vym.. good for all kinds of things.. however there is a bug in the one in the repos for Intrepid if you add notes to a branch.. you can compile the latest yourself . .it's pretty easy
